publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1171# Alex Fergusson: Waiver of Groundwater Maintenance Charge—That the Parliament notes that the annual groundwater maintenance charge has been waived for sheep farmers in England and Wales and asks the Scottish Executive to instruct the Scottish Environment Protection Agency to waive its charge in order to eliminate the competitive disadvantage which is currently borne by Scotland’s farmers. R Supported by: Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Bill Aitken*, David McLetchie*
S1M-1171# Waiver of Groundwater Maintenance Charge (lodged on 11 September 2000) John Scott*, Mr Murray Tosh*, David Mundell*
S1M-1171# Waiver of Groundwater Maintenance Charge (lodged on 11 September 2000) Phil Gallie*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Nick Johnston*, Dr Winnie Ewing*, Alex Johnstone*
S1M-1171# Waiver of Groundwater Maintenance Charge (lodged on 11 September 2000) George Lyon*, Mr Brian Monteith*

S1M-1171# Alex Fergusson: Waiver of Groundwater Maintenance Charge-That the Parliament notes that the annual groundwater maintenance charge has been waived for sheep farmers in England and Wales and asks the Scottish Executive to instruct the Scottish Environment Protection Agency to waive its charge in order to eliminate the competitive disadvantage which is currently borne by Scotland's farmers. R Supported by: Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Bill Aitken, David McLetchie, John Scott, Mr Murray Tosh, David Mundell, Phil Gallie, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Nick Johnston, Dr Winnie Ewing, Alex Johnstone, George Lyon, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-1171# Waiver of Groundwater Maintenance Charge (lodged on 11 September 2000) Christine Grahame*
S1M-1171# Waiver of Groundwater Maintenance Charge (lodged on 11 September 2000) Mr David Davidson*

S1M-1171# Alex Fergusson: Waiver of Groundwater Maintenance Charge—That the Parliament notes that the annual groundwater maintenance charge has been waived for sheep farmers in England and Wales and asks the Scottish Executive to instruct the Scottish Environment Protection Agency to waive its charge in order to eliminate the competitive disadvantage which is currently borne by Scotland’s farmers. R Supported by: Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Bill Aitken, David McLetchie, John Scott, Mr Murray Tosh, David Mundell, Phil Gallie, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Nick Johnston, Dr Winnie Ewing, Alex Johnstone, George Lyon, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Keith Harding, Christine Grahame, Mr David Davidson
S1M-1171# Waiver of Groundwater Maintenance Charge (lodged on 11 September 2000) Nora Radcliffe*, Tavish Scott*, Alasdair Morgan*, Euan Robson*

S1M-1171# Alex Fergusson: Waiver of Groundwater Maintenance Charge—That the Parliament notes that the annual groundwater maintenance charge has been waived for sheep farmers in England and Wales and asks the Scottish Executive to instruct the Scottish Environment Protection Agency to waive its charge in order to eliminate the competitive disadvantage which is currently borne by Scotland’s farmers. R Supported by: Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Bill Aitken, David McLetchie, John Scott, Mr Murray Tosh, David Mundell, Phil Gallie, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Nick Johnston, Dr Winnie Ewing, Alex Johnstone, George Lyon, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Keith Harding, Christine Grahame, Mr David Davidson, Nora Radcliffe, Tavish Scott, Alasdair Morgan, Euan Robson, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-1171# Waiver of Groundwater Maintenance Charge (lodged on 11 September 2000) Ms Sandra White*

S1M-1171# Alex Fergusson: Waiver of Groundwater Maintenance Charge—That the Parliament notes that the annual groundwater maintenance charge has been waived for sheep farmers in England and Wales and believes that the Scottish Environment Protection Agency should waive its charge in order to eliminate the competitive disadvantage which is currently borne by Scotland’s farmers. R Supported by: Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Bill Aitken, David McLetchie, John Scott, Mr Murray Tosh, David Mundell, Phil Gallie, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Nick Johnston, Dr Winnie Ewing, Alex Johnstone, George Lyon, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Keith Harding, Christine Grahame, Mr David Davidson, Nora Radcliffe, Tavish Scott, Alasdair Morgan, Euan Robson, Mr Adam Ingram, Ms Sandra White, Richard Lochhead*

S1M-1171# Alex Fergusson: Waiver of Groundwater Maintenance Charge—That the Parliament notes that the annual groundwater maintenance charge has been waived for sheep farmers in England and Wales and believes that the Scottish Environment Protection Agency should waive its charge in order to eliminate the competitive disadvantage which is currently borne by Scotland’s farmers. R Supported by: Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Bill Aitken, David McLetchie, John Scott, Mr Murray Tosh, David Mundell, Phil Gallie, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Nick Johnston, Dr Winnie Ewing, Alex Johnstone, George Lyon, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Keith Harding, Christine Grahame, Mr David Davidson, Nora Radcliffe, Tavish Scott, Alasdair Morgan, Euan Robson, Mr Adam Ingram, Ms Sandra White, Richard Lochhead
S1M-1171# Waiver of Groundwater Maintenance Charge (lodged on 11 September 2000) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-1171# Waiver of Groundwater Maintenance Charge (lodged on 11 September 2000) Mary Scanlon*

S1M-1171# Alex Fergusson: Waiver of Groundwater Maintenance Charge—That the Parliament notes that the annual groundwater maintenance charge has been waived for sheep farmers in England and Wales and believes that the Scottish Environment Protection Agency should waive its charge in order to eliminate the competitive disadvantage which is currently borne by Scotland’s farmers. R Supported by: Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Bill Aitken, David McLetchie, John Scott, Mr Murray Tosh, David Mundell, Phil Gallie, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Nick Johnston, Dr Winnie Ewing, Alex Johnstone, George Lyon, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Keith Harding, Christine Grahame, Mr David Davidson, Nora Radcliffe, Tavish Scott, Alasdair Morgan, Euan Robson, Mr Adam Ingram, Ms Sandra White, Richard Lochhead, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mary Scanlon
